alert.note: Alert for Brown; Kewaunee; Menominee; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 10:46AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN BROWN...NORTHWESTERN KEWAUNEE...SOUTHEASTERN MENOMINEE...NORTHERN WAUPACA...SOUTHERN OCONTO AND SHAWANO COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 AM CDT... At 1042 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along Highway 29 from Wittenberg to Krakow in Shawano county. Storms were moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Shawano, Bay Shore Park, Clintonville, Oconto, Pulaski, Gillett, Wittenberg, Embarrass, Navarino Wildlife Area, and Legend Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Kewaunee; Menominee; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca
